author: Nanci Diethert
comment: I have installed and reinstalled several times and I can only get one butterfly to show up, a green one. Nothing else. Tried to change on my watch (LG Urbane) and one the phone. Zip.
title: Won't work.

author: Joshua Sailor
comment: People will buy this thinking that it's animated like the Apple Watch. It's not. Not horrible pictures, but not anything special either.

reply.author: Friday Mobi
reply.content: Thanks Joshua for feedback, it is great idea to animate the butterflies. In next few days we gonna work on this, so keep patience - such a feature will be implemented as You wished :)

title: Not animated.
